title: Comparative analysis of natural language processing methodologies for classifying computed tomography enterography reports in Crohn's disease patients

abstract: Imaging is crucial to assess disease extent, activity, and outcomes in inflammatory bowel disease (IBD). Artificial intelligence (AI) image interpretation requires automated exploitation of studies at scale as an initial step. Here we evaluate natural …

title: 0423 Leveraging Large Language Models to Develop Natural Language Processing Code for Extracting Sleep Study Data

abstract: Introduction Apnea-hypopnea index (AHI) considers only the rate of sleep apnea events, providing an incomplete view of sleep apnea and its adverse health outcomes. In contrast, this study considers temporal interactions among events from …

title: Evaluating fine-tuned GPT models on different datasets in the healthcare domain
details: YH Lim, PSQ Yeoh, KW Lai - Innovation and Emerging Technologies, 2025
abstract: This study investigates the performance of fine-tuned generative pre-trained transformers (GPT) on different healthcare datasets to enhance public health literacy. The background of this study is rooted in the recognition of the critical role health …
